author: abcoathup
content:
@hsiao-wei would be great if you could add a short summary of actions/decisions (either here or Eth Magicians)
https://ethereum-magicians.org/t/peerdas-breakout-11-october-29-2024/21383

author: jimmygchen
content:
- Client teams have been working on sync refacotring, pectra rebase, various optimisation and devnet issues.
- `peerdas-devnet-3` is in a pretty bad state and will be shut down today. `peerdas-devnet-4` has been scheuled for end of November.
- Client teams discussed whether to activate PeerDAS at the Fulu fork, and agreed to discuss with the wider group in the next ACD.
- Discussions on various spec changes: `consensus-spec#3832`, `consensus-spec#3993`, and activation of `EIP-7742`. Client teams to review the PRs and provide feedback.
- Discussed PeerDAS metric PRs, client teams to review and provide feedback.
- The next breakout call will be cancelled due to devcon, next call will be on the 26th Nov.
